text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Right, I think that's enough for today's… Hm?
Something wrong?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: No, but it seems we have a spectator.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Ah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: An acquaintance of yours, I presume?
Nope. But if I remember correctly…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text:
Phew. Another honest day's work! And now, the event we've all been 
waiting for—Roll the McQueen!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: I beg your pardon?! What a dreadful-sounding name! Whatever it is, we are not doing it!

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey! Come back here!
I didn't know her, but I had seen her around. She was always the last one out practicing.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…
And there she was, running and running, all by herself.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant… Ah!
Thud!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hnngh… Ow…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: All this running, and nothing to show for it…

It was like watching McQueen all over again, training for the Tenno 
Sho as if her life depended on it.
You okay?
You okay?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huh? Oh… You're McQueen's trainer…

You shouldn't run through the pain. Not if you want to win your next 
race.

You shouldn't run through the pain. Not if you want to win your next 
race.
It sucks you can't do more now, I know. But just hold on to that feeling, and it'll take you to the winner's circle.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Sniffle… Sob…
Whoa, uh… Didn't think you hurt yourself that badly.
Whoa, uh… Didn't think you hurt yourself that badly.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: N-no, sorry, it's… it's just…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text:
I love running… but I just can't seem to win. And when I see McQueen 
race—

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: I… I want to win too!

"I want to win." It's easy to say those words once. But to Rice Shower, 
they were a mantra.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Me? In the Derby…
I know you can do it. I've watched you run more than anyone.
I know you can do it. I've watched you run more than anyone.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-but… I'm just not at that level.

I can't blame her for being intimidated. The Derby draws the fiercest 
contenders around.

Still, Rice has the legs to keep up with McQueen. And more 
importantly…
choice_data_list: You still want to win, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Ah…

That ambition is what leads to hard work. And hard work is what leads 
to confidence.
So what do you say? The Derby calls!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …O-okay. I'll give it a try.

It took a little prodding, but she's taken her first step towards the 
wide world that awaits her.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: So all I have to do is follow McQueen?
Yep. Just follow the leader, no matter what.
Yep. Just follow the leader, no matter what.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
Out of all the contenders for this year's Derby, there's one clear 
favorite: the undefeated Mihono Bourbon.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text:
She takes the lead and sets a precise pace, rather like a machine. It's 
truly a sight to behold.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: If you're to best her, you'll first need to be able to keep up with me.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: …Okay. I'll try my best not to fall behind.

It's not easy, keeping the perfect stalking distance. It demands both 
stamina and focus, especially against someone like McQueen.

Rice gets off to a rough start, falling behind time and time again, but 
she keeps at it. And after a few days…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Huff… Puff…

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Hey, look at that! You didn't fall behind a single time today!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well done. That stamina will serve you well.
choice_data_list:
Just like that! That's how you're gonna win the 
Derby!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Y-yeah!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Well then, farewell to you all.

text_block_list.name: Gold Ship
text_block_list.text: Smell ya later!

text_block_list.name: Upbeat Umamusume
text_block_list.text: See you tomorrow!

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep following…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep following…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Sigh…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Just keep following, just keep following…

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: …Erm, Rice.

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: Hweh?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: Do you mean to sleep beside me again? I'm not sure following me everywhere I go will benefit you…

text_block_list.name: Rice Shower
text_block_list.text: B-but Trainer said to follow you, no matter what.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen
text_block_list.text: (…This is most definitely not what Trainer had in mind.)

After several days of relentless training, the highlight of the Twinkle 
Series, the Japanese Derby, is finally here.
